coredata.dc:title: Simple calculation of the pair distribution function for a moderately dense hard-sphere fluid
coredata.dc:creator: Oden, L.E.
Henderson, D.
coredata.dc:description:
Abstract
The pair distribution function and equation of state of a hard-sphere fluid are calculated for several modifications of the Percus-Yevick (PY) theory by means of a perturbation calculation in which the zeroth-order term is the PY result. Even in first order, this technique provides a very simple way of examining modifications of the PY theory and yields accurate results for low and moderately dense (ρσ3 ⩽ 0.8) hard-sphere fluids.
